<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Armored Rebuff](/Feats.aspx?ID=6412) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 215 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Sentinel](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=264), [Stalwart Defender](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=205) (Level 10)

**Prerequisites**
[Sentinel Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6409)

**Trigger**
An adjacent enemy critically fails an attack roll to [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) you with a melee weapon or unarmed attack.

**Requirements**
You are wearing medium armor or heavier.

</column>

---

You rebuff puny attacks with your armor, knocking back your foe. Attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380) the triggering enemy, even if you don't have a hand free. If you succeed, you can't [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305) to follow the enemy, as you're knocking the enemy back with the rebounded attack, not by physically moving towards them.
name: Armored Rebuff
requirement: You are wearing medium armor or heavier.
requirement_markdown: You are wearing medium armor or heavier.
